        public int update(Mode mode)
        Updates dragon moving and or making it fall asleep/wake up randomly if necessary.
        Parameters:
        mode - the game's mode
        Returns:
        an int representing the direction taken by the dragon STAY, UP, DOWN, RIGHT or LEFT
